body: Try +GuildsOfSubstance. Subscriber requirements are poison, why require subscribers to make a list if the whole point of the list is to gain subscribers? The guilds with subscribers already don't need advertising, the new ones do. This was a common trick defaultmods used to make sure their subreddits always got popular and others couldn't grow.
body_html: Try +GuildsOfSubstance. Subscriber requirements are poison, why require subscribers to make a list if the whole point of the list is to gain subscribers? The guilds with subscribers already don't need advertising, the new ones do. This was a common trick defaultmods used to make sure their subreddits always got popular and others couldn't grow.

body:
Okay, I believe you, but it's pretty hard to get this chance every single time. There has to be something you're doing, even just subconsciously, that lets you know exactly when and where to check for things.

EDIT: AND YOU FUCKING DID IT WITH @captainmeta4's POST ABOUT CBS TOO! You always do that. This kind of stuff is why I call you perfect, because you have a damn near 100% success rate at everything without even thinking about it. And for me, nothing I do is even worth the outcome no matter how hard I try with it. I'll never amount to anything in life.
body_html:
